mapper.select: SELECT b.board_seq, b.board_type_seq, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.del_yn, b.reg_dtm, b.reg_member_seq, m.member_id AS regMemberId, m.member_nm AS regMemberNm, b.update_dtm, b.update_member_seq, bt.board_type_nm FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON bt.board_type_seq = b.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON m.member_seq = b.reg_member_seq WHERE 1 = 1 AND b.board_type_seq = ${type} ORDER BY b.board_seq DESC LIMIT ${start}, ${size}

SELECT b.board_seq, b.board_type_seq, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.del_yn, b.reg_dtm, b.reg_member_seq, m.member_id AS regMemberId, m.member_nm AS regMemberNm, b.update_dtm, b.update_member_seq, bt.board_type_nm FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON bt.board_type_seq = b.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON m.member_seq = b.reg_member_seq WHERE b.board_seq = ${boardSeq} ORDER BY b.board_seq DESC
